channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 21:51 Alarm lifted in Odesa region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 21:51 Alarm lifted in Odesa region. Follow further messages. #Odessa_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
